text: Okenia digitata is a species of sea slug, specifically a dorid nudibranch, a marine gastropod mollusc in the family Goniodorididae. ==Distribution== This species was described from Ghana. It has also been reported from Angola.Vallès Y., Valdés Á. & Ortea J. (2000). On the phanerobranch dorids of Angola (Mollusca, Nudibranchia): a crossroads of temperate and tropical species. Zoosystema. 22(1): 15-31. ==Description== ==Ecology== ==References== Category:Goniodorididae Category:Gastropods described in 1966
title: Okenia digitata
